FuncDef: The display dhcp-server item command displays information about a DHCPv4 server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a DHCPv4 server.
The value is in the dotted decimal format.

Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To display the current status of a DHCPv4 server and speed limit information, run the display dhcp-server item command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
